## Request a Recipe

Have a specific REDCap challenge you'd like to see addressed? [Open an issue](https://github.com/centerforhealthyminds/redcap-recipes/issues) on our GitHub repository with your request.

## Contributing

We welcome contributions! If you have a recipe to share:

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a new `.qmd` file in the `recipes/` directory
3. Follow the structure shown in existing recipes
4. Submit a pull request

See our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/centerforhealthyminds/redcap-recipes) for more details.
